changelogversion.changelogtext: Adding Morningstar as the price provider.
Improvements and adjustments in auto-sync and progress display.
Removing a few direct references to Dropbox.
Handling errors on opening Asset Allocation.
Handling errors during price download from YQL.

Note: There are BIG changes in this release! This release includes support for four major cloud storage providers: Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, and Box. Dropbox synchronization now can use a file anywhere in the file tree and is not limited to the app folder. Dropbox is deprecating API v1 and therefore you will need to reinitialize synchronization. Please test out and report any feedback either via email or on GitHub.
